Module cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool
Package cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
cz.cvut.fel.pjv.dd_simple_tool.Tile
public class Tile
extends java.lang.Object
Tile object representing a tile in the map. Has unique coordinates and can be filled with various terrain.
